Fundlet Roadmap

See what we are working on now so you can stay up-to-date with Fundlet.

Friday, 12/19RELEASED

• Enhancement – Add Partner Request form to dashboard

Friday, 12/12RELEASED

• Internal – Move webhook processing to functions

Friday, 12/5RELEASED

• Enhancement – Show customer last name and first initial on order list and exports (pending Shopify approval)

• Enhancement – Support for fundlet_override_exclude tag to allow excluded items on a per order basis

Friday, 12/5RELEASED

• Enhancement – Show customer last name and first initial on order list and exports (pending Shopify approval)

• Enhancement – Support for fundlet_override_exclude tag to allow excluded items on a per order basis

Friday, 11/30RELEASED

• Enhancement – Show Line Item in Export

• Enhancement – Picklist export - orders grouped by participant

• Enhancement – Update counts on only active fundraisers

Friday, 11/21RELEASED

• Enhancement – Minor UI updates to use the latest version of Shopify's UI toolkit

• Enhancement – Update counts on only active fundraisers

• Enhancement – Update counts for participants when viewing campaign page

• Enhancement – Allow for manual association of participants to order with order tag

• Enhancement – Enable shopping sessions on the Shop Site button to allow participant association

• Enhancement – Enable PARTIALLY_REFUNDED status to be included in campaign totals

• Bug Fix – Participant email on settings not updating

• Bug Fix – Campaign order search was not specific in cases where campaigns share the same prefix (e.g. ROCKET, ROCKET1)

Friday, 11/14RELEASED

• Feature – Fundlet Header block enables a standalone cart and optionally hides your site header and footer to create an isolated fundraiser page

Friday, 11/7RELEASED

• Feature – Support for individual products to be added to a campaign. Can be used standalone or with a collection. Enables the use of unlisted products as these don't show in a collection.

• Improvement – Display Sold Out tag on Fundlet Collection. Gray out button in modal for Sold Out.

• Improvement – Improve display of date on Fundlet Banner. From 2025-12-25 to Dec 25.

Friday, 10/31RELEASED

• Improvement – Moved filter over product list to better align with Shopify standards.

• Bug Fix – Replaced Shopify storefront web components with liquid/javascript solution to fix errors shown on page.

Friday, 10/24RELEASED

• Feature – Allow a campaign to be associated with a collection to show campaign banner on collection and automatically associate products with campaign.

• Improvement – Organization name setting and display on Fundlet Banner.

• Feature – Support for payout tiers.

• Improvement – Setting to show participants on top on mobile on Fundlet Collection.

• Improvement – Setting to exclude items not directly tagged on the campaign from the payout.

• Improvement – Combine create and edit form for a consistent experience.

Friday, 10/17RELEASED

• Feature – Fundlet Filter widget to filter campaign items by price.

• Feature – Branded portal (aka share campagin page) feature

• Improvement – Edit discount code if orders are no associated with campaign

• Improvement – Countdown on Fundlet Banner

• Bugfix – Anti-spam deterrents on external forms

Friday, 10/10RELEASED

• Feature – CSV upload of participants

• Feature – Settings page with branding and default settings
